document_data.name: Everlight Theatre
document_data.mainbody: The '''Everlight Theatre''' was a theater in [[Elturel]].
document_data.Services: The playhouse put on performances from bardic troupes such as the [[Sharptongue Travelling Troupe]]. The Everlight Theatre hosted [[Cagon Fegg]]'s great play, ''[[The Folly and the Fall]]'', which was shown for one season only.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The theatre was said to have erupted into chaos after ''The Folly and the Fall'' was performed.
